testcase.name: network

error.message:
An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. Original error: Error executing adbExec. Original error: 'Command ''C:\\Users\\HP USER\\AppData\\Local\\Android\\Sdk\\platform-tools\\adb.exe' -P 5037 -s GAPBB6F68TOR4DIZ shell am broadcast -a android.intent.action.AIRPLANE_MODE --ez state true' exited with code 255'; Stderr: 'Security exception: Permission Denial: not allowed to send broadcast android.intent.action.AIRPLANE_MODE from pid=21054, uid=2000
java.lang.SecurityException: Permission Denial: not allowed to send broadcast android.intent.action.AIRPLANE_MODE from pid=21054, uid=2000 at com.android.server.am.ActivityManagerService.broadcastIntentLocked(ActivityManagerService.java:25003) at com.android.server.am.ActivityManagerService.broadcastIntent(ActivityManagerService.java:25745) at com.android.server.am.ActivityManagerShellCommand.runSendBroadcast(ActivityManagerShellCommand.java:716) at com.android.server.am.ActivityManagerShellCommand.onCommand(ActivityManagerShellCommand.java:188) at android.os.ShellCommand.exec(ShellCommand.java:103) at com.android.server.am.ActivityManagerService.onShellCommand(ActivityManagerService.java:19253) at android.os.Binder.shellCommand(Binder.java:641) at android.os.Binder.onTransact(Binder.java:539) at android.app.IActivityManager$Stub.onTransact(IActivityManager.java:3450) at com.android.server.am.ActivityManagerService.onTransact(ActivityManagerService.java:3796) at android.os.Binder.execTransact(Binder.java:750)'; Code: '255' (WARNING: The server did not provide any stacktrace information) Command duration or timeout: 2.18 seconds Build info: version: '2.53.1', revision: 'a36b8b1cd5757287168e54b817830adce9b0158d', time: '2016-06-30 19:26:09' System info: host: 'HP', ip: '127.0.0.1', os.name: 'Windows 10', os.arch: 'amd64', os.version: '10.0', java.version: '1.8.0_281' Driver info: io.appium.java_client.android.AndroidDriver Capabilities [{appPackage=com.androidsample.generalstore, statBarHeight=56, noReset=true, viewportRect={top=56, left=0, width=720, height=1351}, deviceName=GAPBB6F68TOR4DIZ, UDID=GAPBB6F68TOR4DIZ, platform=LINUX, deviceUDID=GAPBB6F68TOR4DIZ, desired={appPackage=com.androidsample.generalstore, appActivity=.SplashActivity, noReset=true, platformVersion=9, automationName=Appium, platformName=Android, deviceName=vivo 1902, UDID=GAPBB6F68TOR4DIZ}, platformVersion=9, webStorageEnabled=false, automationName=Appium, takesScreenshot=true, javascriptEnabled=true, platformName=Android, deviceApiLevel=28, deviceManufacturer=vivo, deviceScreenSize=720x1544, networkConnectionEnabled=true, warnings={}, databaseEnabled=false, appActivity=.SplashActivity, pixelRatio=2, locationContextEnabled=false, deviceScreenDensity=320, deviceModel=vivo 1902}] Session ID: 75d5c880-dba9-4f4e-ba33-03e5762bfd6c
